sentences.english: We will relocate the factory outside the city.
sentences.chinese: 我們將把工廠遷到城外。

sentences.english: It should follow the example of the new Apex Theater in the mall outside of town.
sentences.chinese: 它應該借鑑城外商業街上新的Apex劇院的例子。

sentences.english: We live outside of town, near the Merritt Parkway.
sentences.chinese: 我們住在城外，在邁瑞特公園路附近。

sentences.english: Then the servant took ten camels and made his way to the town of Nahor.
sentences.chinese: 管家把駱駝安置在城外的井旁休息。

sentences.english: The road goes around in a loop and rejoins the main road about 2 kilometers past the town.
sentences.chinese: 這條路呈環狀，在城外兩公里處與幹道會合。

sentences.english: We will attack them outside the towns at their own bases.
sentences.chinese: 我們會在城外他們自己的基地處對他們進行襲擊。

sentences.english: The escaped convict was seized outside the city.
Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的倖存者扛着救災牀墊走在北川縣城外。

sentences.english: Our truck broke down outside town.
sentences.chinese: 我們的卡車在城外拋錨了。

sentences.english: A romantic little cabin out of town would be cool.
sentences.chinese: 去城外的浪漫小屋玩玩是不錯的。

sentences.english: Outside the city next to the sea, the mountain road twists and turns and winds around.
sentences.chinese: 在城外緊靠大海的地方，山路迂迴曲折，四處延伸。

sentences.english: And I'm trying to go uptown. Why is this happening to me? What's going on?"
sentences.chinese: 我想去城外。爲什麼這會發生在我身上？怎麼回事？”

sentences.english: Waiting the Ye should have already waited for outside the city.
sentences.chinese: 候爺應該已在城外等候了。

sentences.english: In the desert outside the city, I came to a roadblock manned by a large group of rebels.
sentences.chinese: 我來到城外的沙漠裏，路障後有大量武裝好的叛軍。

sentences.english: Survivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的倖存者扛着救災牀墊走在北川縣城外。

sentences.english: Police set up road-blocks on routes leading out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方在通往城外的路上設置了路障。

definition: to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
capital of 府 prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)/prefectural seat
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
